Description:
We are looking for an experienced Warehouse Supervisor to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of the warehouse, ensuring that it runs efficiently, safely and productively.Responsibilities include:Supervising and monitoring the performance of all warehouse staff
Ensuring that all warehouse processes, including receiving, storing, and shipping, are done accurately and efficiently
Developing and implementing procedures to improve the efficiency of the warehouse
Maintaining a safe and secure working environment
Monitoring inventory levels and ordering new supplies as neededIf you are interested in this position, We look forward to hearing from you.Sincerely,Sayed MahbobiSkills
Skills:
Previous experience in a warehouse setting
Knowledge of Reading& writing in english warehouse operations and safety procedures
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
Excellent organizational and communication skills
Good problem-solving and decision-making skills
